column1: It is in evidence  that there are  two  separate cases pending in  the
District Court of Kuliyapitiya with  regard  to  the  two  deeds.  In  the case
of the defendant who is said to  be abroad in Italy,  who is the son of the
appellant, it is the appellant who is looking after the interest of the son,
according to PW  1 who is the plaintiff of that action.  She has evidenced
in pages 302,303,310,311  of the Brief as follows ;
